titleInfo.title: The new American painting, as shown in eight European countries, 1958-1959.

mods.note: Exhibition catalog; Includes art lent by Nelson A. Rockefeller: Jackson" by Jams Brooks (1956), "The Calendars" by Arshile Gorky (1946-7), "City life" by Grace Hartigan (1956), "Number 12" by Jackson Pollock (1952) and art lent by Blanchette Hooker Rockefeller: "Essex market" by Grace Hartigan (1956) and "Accent grave" by Franz Kline (1955)."
